name: v1.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Move benchmark activation logic under ENABLE_TESTING by @mrbald in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/705
* Use curl as bazel_dep by @mmorel-35 in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/709
* Feature/update bazel deps by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/710
* Use civetweb as bazel_dep by @mmorel-35 in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/712
* build(bazel): Add support for --incompatible_disallow_empty_glob by @keith in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/715
* Add config for basic package version file by @PythonGermany in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/713
* Add presetupCurl callback to Gateway. by @nbelov-magdv in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/706
* feat(push): allow any url prefix for push gateway by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/723
* ci: switch to supported macos-13 by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/724

## New Contributors
* @mrbald made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/705
* @mmorel-35 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/709
* @keith made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/715
* @PythonGermany made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/713
* @nbelov-magdv made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/706

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/compare/v1.2.4...v1.3.0

name: v1.2.1
body:

## Push
* Add missing encode for push labels by @gjasny

name: v1.2.0
body:
## What's Changed

* build: revert code base back to C++11 by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/620
* build(bazel): add Bazel modules by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/631

### Core
* Use std::atomic::fetch_add in modern C++. by @Romain-Geissler-1A in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/622
* Add Reset APIs to histogram and counters by @hkadayam in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/601
* feat(core): optimize add by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/673

### Pull
* feat(pull): use civetweb 1.16 by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/648

### Push
* Encode push labels by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/675
* feat(push): allow timeout for HTTP requests by @gjasny in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/676

## New Contributors
* @bsergean made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/617
* @vihangm made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/626
* @hkadayam made their first contribution in https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/pull/601

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jupp0r/prometheus-cpp/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

name: v1.1.0
body:
This release introduces the [Info metric](#595) for static content. Additionally it contains small bugfixes as well as consistency checks.
Prometheus-cpp now requires a C++ 14 compatible compiler.

# Core
* fix: enforce requirements on bucket boundaries
* fix: reject invalid label names
* feat: Add Info metric
* feat: Binary search for bucket boundaries in Histogram::Observe
* feat: Add new constructor for Histogram and Summary taking rvalue ref of parameters
* test: prevent rotation on slow CPUs

# Pull
* feat: Add SSL support to Bazel build

# Push
* feat: Add push support http header customization
* fix: Allow POST empty data

name: v1.0.1
body:
This is an ABI-compatible maintenance release for `v1.0.0`.

# Core

* fix(core): enforce requirements on bucket boundaries
* test(core): prevent rotation on slow CPUs
* feat(core): binary search for bucket boundaries in Histogram::Observe

# Push

* fix(push): allow POST empty data

# Misc

* build: increase version number
* chore: update copyright for 2022
* fix: handle absolute paths in pkgconfig files
* chore: update Bazel dependencies
* ci: update GitHub Actions worflows
* fix: add missing std:: on size_t

name: v1.0.0
body:
# Core

- docs(core): Document atomic increment
- fix(core): gracefully handle label hash collisions
- feat(core)!: remove nonstandard append mode
- chore(core): Introduce Labels type
- feat(core): Allow to remove a Family from their Registry
- fix: there is a race condition when pushing and collecting histogram data

# Pull

- fix(pull): Properly lock Exposer functions

# Push

- chore(push): Use curl 7.80.0
- chore(push): Refactored curl_wrapper
- fix(push): Lock access to collectables_
- fix(push): remove unused variable
- feat(push): Add method to delete metrics for instance
- Rule of Five applied on Gateway, avoid unnecessary copies of std::string

# Misc

- fix(clang-tidy): Fix errors detected by clang-tidy
- chore(clang-tidy): Fix modernize-use-override
- chore(clang-tidy): Fix cppcoreguidelines-special-member-functions
- docs: Prepare for 1.0.0 release
- fix(readme): update the link to the cmake example

name: v0.13.0
body:
* fix(core): Locale-independent floating-point serialization (#509)
* feat(core): Make summary quantiles non-const (#425)
* chore(pull): Use civetweb 1.15

name: v0.12.3
body:
* fix(push): Always use POST (regardless of body presence) (#469)
* feat(core): add method to query family if metric exists (#482)
* feat(pull): Add CivetCallbacks to Exposer ctor (#479)
* chore(cmake): Change cmake min version to 3.14
* chore(pull): use civetweb 1.14
* chore(push): use curl 7.76.1
* chore: use google benchmark 1.5.3

name: v0.12.2
body:
* feat(cmake): generate pkg-config files
* fix(core): reject duplicate label names (#463)
* feat(core): Replace name check regex (#462)
* fix(pull): Announce utf-8 content encoding
* fix(core): avoid collecting empty metric families
* fix: organize includes with include-what-you-use

name: v0.12.1
body: Bugfix release for C++17 std::to_chars usage

name: v0.6.0
body:
* add support for using system dependencies (thanks Gregor Jasny <gjasny@googlemail.com>)
* improve various documentation pieces (thanks Jerry Crunchtime <jerry.c.t@web.de>)
* fix memory leak in `Family` (thanks Jerry Crunctime <jerry.c.t@web.de>)
* replace `cpr` with plain `libcurl` (thanks Gregor Jasny <gjasny@googlemail.com>)
* remove some dead code (thanks Jerry Crunchtime <jerry.c.t@web.de>)
* make labels orderable (thanks Martin Unzner <martin.u@posteo.de>)
* add support for building with `--std=gnu++17` (thanks Romain Geissler <romain.geissler@amadeus.com>)
* lots of smaller cleanups (thanks Jerry Crunchtime <jerry.c.t@web.de>)
* numerous improvements to CMake and Bazel (thanks Gregor Jasny <gjasny@googlemail.com>)

name: v0.5.0
body:
* Add method to serialize metrics to ostream (thanks Patrick Gansterer <paroga@paroga.com>)
* Fix summary text format (thanks Brian Hong <sungjinhong@devsisters.com>)
* Add gzip compression support (thanks Gregor Jasny <gjasny@googlemail.com>)
* Fix Readme typos (thanks Mateusz Piotrowski <0mp@FreeBSD.org>)
* lots of CMake and Bazel fixes (thanks again, Gregor Jasny <gjasny@googlemail.com>)

name: v0.4.2
body:
* split the library into a core library and one providing ready-to-use exposers
* add basic authentication support
* add push gateway support
* remove zlib (unused)
* fix bazel build on windows
* fix GCC 4.8 compatibility

name: v0.4.1
body: * fixes a compile bug on GCC 7 introduced in v0.4

name: v0.4
body:
* remove protobuf dependency (thanks to Gregor Jasny)
* fix compile errors due to missing <limits> include (thanks to Thomas Barbier and Alexandre Jacquin)
* fix uninitialized buffer compiler warnings
* use more canonical bazel workspace name (thanks to Rodrigo Queiro)
* avoid invalidating bazel caches by exposing asan as a define macro (thanks to g-easy)
* remove the JSON serializer
* compile-guard the usage of std::regex for broken standard libraries (thanks to Gregor Jasny)
* fix VS 2013 template instantiation bug (thanks Dhi Aurrahman)
* move from git_repository to http_archive repository rules (thanks Ian Sturdy)
* add Summary metric (thanks Daejiv)
* make civetweb exposer optional for people who use their own http stack (thanks Ben M. Ward)
* small performance improvements (thanks Renat Idrisov)

name: v0.2
body:
* support prometheus 2.0 by exposing the official prometheus text format #9 
* fixed a bug where histogram boundaries were exclusive (now inclusive) #80 
* expose metric serializers as part of the public interface in order to make it easier for consumer to write custom collectors #79 
* prevent multiple adds with the same label set at runtime #75

name: Benchmark test fixes
body: - fixed a small issue where metric names used in benchmarks did not conform to the newly-checked formats

name: Reduce number of http worker threads
body: - reduce the number of worker threads from 50 (civetweb default) to 2

name: Add metrics url path option
body: * add option on which url path to expose the collection api

name: Bugfixes
body:
* fix GCC 6 compilation error
* add unit test for histogram builder usage

name: Histogram fixes
body: * fix cumulative counts for histograms
